1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Bracket type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Bracket
6  ( -- * Bracket type
7    BracketType (..),
8    getBracketType,
9
10    -- * Open and close
11    openGroup,  closeGroup,
12    openTerm,   closeTerm,
13    openList,   closeList,
14    openSet,    closeSet,
15    openTie,    closeTie,
16    openRel,    closeRel,
17    openInterp, closeInterp,
18    openType,   closeType,
19  ) where
20
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token          as S
23
24-- | Type of bracket.
25data BracketType
26    = BracketGroup    -- ^ __1.__ Round brackets for grouping:
27                      --   @( E ... )@
28    | BracketTerm     -- ^ __2.__ Round-single brackets for term path:
29                      --   @(- \/P ... -)@
30    | BracketList     -- ^ __3.__ Square brackets for lists:
31                      --   @[ C | ... ]@
32    | BracketSet      -- ^ __4.__ Curely braces for sets:
33                      --   @{ C | ... }@
34    | BracketTie      -- ^ __5.__ Curely-single braces for ties:
35                      --   @{- /N C ... -}@
36    | BracketRel      -- ^ __6.__ Curely-double braces for relations:
37                      --   @{= /N ... [ C | ... ][ C | ... ] =}@
38    | BracketInterp   -- ^ __7.__ Curely-bar braces for data interpretation:
39                      --   @{| ... /N ... |}@
40    | BracketType     -- ^ __8.__ Square-single brackets for type:
41                      --   @[- ... -]@
42    | BracketForm     -- ^ __9.__ Round-bar brackets for calculation form:
43                      --   @(| V ... | E ... |)@
44    | BracketUnknown  -- ^ __10.__ Unknown bracket
45      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
46
47-- | Bracket type of token.
48getBracketType :: B.GetBracketType BracketType S.Token
49getBracketType = B.bracketTable
50    [ o BracketGroup   openGroup  closeGroup
51    , o BracketTerm    openTerm   closeTerm
52    , o BracketList    openList   closeList
53    , o BracketSet     openSet    closeSet
54    , o BracketTie     openTie    closeTie
55    , o BracketRel     openRel    closeRel
56    , o BracketInterp  openInterp closeInterp
57    , o BracketType    openType   closeType
58    , o BracketForm    "(|"       "|)"
59    , (BracketUnknown, S.isOpenToken, S.isCloseToken)
60    ] where o t a b = (t, S.isOpenTokenOf a, S.isCloseTokenOf b)
61
62-- | Open group: @"("@
63openGroup :: String
64openGroup = "("
65
66-- | Close group: @")"@
67closeGroup :: String
68closeGroup = ")"
69
70-- | Open term path: @"(-"@
71openTerm :: String
72openTerm = "(-"
73
74-- | Close term path: @"-)"@
75closeTerm :: String
76closeTerm = "-)"
77
78-- | Open list: @"["@
79openList :: String
80openList = "["
81
82-- | Close list: @"]"@
83closeList :: String
84closeList = "]"
85
86-- | Open set: @"{"@
87openSet :: String
88openSet = "{"
89
90-- | Close set: @"}"@
91closeSet :: String
92closeSet = "}"
93
94-- | Open tie: @"{-"@
95openTie :: String
96openTie = "{-"
97
98-- | Close tie: @"-}"@
99closeTie :: String
100closeTie = "-}"
101
102-- | Open relation: @"{="@
103openRel :: String
104openRel = "{="
105
106-- | Close relation: @"=}"@
107closeRel :: String
108closeRel = "=}"
109
110-- | Open interpreation: @"{|"@
111openInterp :: String
112openInterp = "{|"
113
114-- | Close interpreation: @"|}"@
115closeInterp :: String
116closeInterp = "|}"
117
118-- | Open type: @"[-"@
119openType :: String
120openType = "[-"
121
122-- | Close type: @"-]"@
123closeType :: String
124closeType = "-]"
125
